name: aCabana
description:
<<<<>>>>

aCabana 

is a vr escape room within a towerwatch, with mysteries and an interesting style

Looking for a job, you accept the job in the mysterious hut, it's only for a few days. What can go wrong? Using a radio and a mysterious machine during these days doesn't seem that bad Features -You can play standing or sitting -Walk with the joystick or create a walking area -All objects are interactive -Made for oculus quest aCabana was made by ArtsPedroHenrl, an indie game developer
